requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 零售调用来源(调用方和有赞约定的值)

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['supplier_code']="SGYS181024142242847980"
params['supplier_name']="测试新增"
params['retail_source']="RENWOXING"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.supplier.update', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'SGYS181024142242847980', 'supplier_name' => '测试新增', 'retail_source' => 'RENWOXING', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';

    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
